title: DigiServices
author: DigiServices
content: I' m looking to make a joint venture with someone with funds.Do you have experience with etherscan/dextools/dexguru/zerion?I have a couple of bot for sniping and for copytrading crypto (the fastest on the market, actually) and i have all the server required and setup, but i need some more funds.Some people claim they're making more than 50k per month.If you are interested send me a dm on the forum.

comments.author: DigiServices
comments.body: Yes, as said i've everything. Nodes, bots, but i need some funds to get started.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: are you already tried it on the testnet. Since testnet you can get unlimited money from other dev and can sniff the DeX if your bot really working rather than risking with real money

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: DigiServices on July 03, 2023, 12:06:46 AMSome people claim they're making more than 50k per month.If you are interested send me a dm on the forum.What are the average server costs for these bots? I see that you are asking for a loan of 250â‚¬ which is a small amount for someone trying to promise you that you will make $50,000 a month.This type of trading is closer to fraud because you depend on the speed of your bots to achieve your profit, but why not try to start with small amounts and then prove that these bots are worth the investment?I do not see an opportunity to make a profit unless it is within a pumpanddrump group, which requires a lot of liquidity or scamming customers by giving them false promises.

comments.author: Billyscottland
comments.body: Run the bot on a test network
